reviewText:
First half covers WW2 pilot experiences with nearing the sound barrier.  Second half covers the competition between the aborted British Miles 52 (which later successfully flew in 1/3 size model form) and the American Bell X-1, which broke through in Oct. 1947.

This early Nova dvd comes in the old snap case.

Being a NOVA series it is short.  I would have liked it to be longer and it deals with many aspects of the project to break the sound barrier.  I was looking for information about Chuck Yeager but there is just a little on Yeager in this video.
